Package Database.trades

Class TradeManager

java.lang.Object
Database.Database<Trade>
Database.trades.TradeManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class TradeManager
extends Database<Trade>
implements java.io.Serializable
Used to manage and store all Database.trades

  • Constructor Details

    • TradeManager

      public TradeManager​(java.lang.String filePath) throws java.io.IOException
      For storing the file path of the .ser file
      Parameters:
      filePath - must take in .ser file
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if creating a file causes issues

  • Method Details

    • addTrade

      public java.lang.String addTrade​(java.lang.String firstUserId, java.lang.String secondUserId, java.util.Date meetingTime, java.util.Date secondMeetingTime, java.lang.String meetingLocation, java.lang.String firstUserOffer, java.lang.String secondUserOffer, int allowedEdits)
      Creates a new Trade
      Parameters:
      firstUserId - the user of the person initializing the trade
      secondUserId - the user of the person the trade is being sent to
      meetingTime - when the meeting takes place
      secondMeetingTime - when the second meeting takes place (make this time to be the same or earlier than the first meeting time for a permanent trade)
      meetingLocation - where the meeting takes place
      firstUserOffer - the item id that the user who initialized the trade is willing to offer
      secondUserOffer - the item id that the user who got sent the trade is willing to offer
      allowedEdits - number of edits allowed before the trade is cancelled
      Returns:
      the object added

    • deleteTrade

      public void deleteTrade​(java.lang.String tradeId) throws EntryNotFoundException
      Removes a Trade from storage
      Parameters:
      tradeId - the trade id that is being removed
      Throws:
      EntryNotFoundException - if the id doesn't refer to anything

    • getItemsFromTrade

      public java.lang.String[] getItemsFromTrade​(java.lang.String tradeId) throws EntryNotFoundException
      Gets the items from a trade
      Parameters:
      tradeId - ID of the trade
      Returns:
      an array of itemIDs of the two items that were involved in the trade
      Throws:
      EntryNotFoundException - trade id wasn't found

    • editTrade

      public java.lang.String editTrade​(java.lang.String tradeId, java.util.Date meetingTime, java.util.Date secondMeetingTime, java.lang.String meetingLocation, java.lang.String firstUserOffer, java.lang.String secondUserOffer) throws CannotTradeException, EntryNotFoundException
      Editing an existing trade
      Parameters:
      tradeId - the trade id
      meetingTime - the new time of the trade
      secondMeetingTime - the second meeting time of the trade
      meetingLocation - the meeting location of the trade
      firstUserOffer - the tradableitem id of the first user offer
      secondUserOffer - the tradableitem id of the second user offer
      Returns:
      the id of the trade
      Throws:
      CannotTradeException - too many edits
      EntryNotFoundException - trade id wasn't found

      Throws:
      EntryNotFoundException - tradeId is not found
